19.name: #BeMorePirate
19.description: A peg-leg, an eyepatch, a hat and a hook, all purchased to pull off the true pirate look!

264.name: A Clash of Bones
264.description: Defeat an enemy Bone Caller Skeleton with your own Bone Caller Skeleton.

226.name: A Favour for the Flame
226.description: Hand in 30 Reaper's Chests or Reaper's Bounties.

179.name: A Pirate's Life for Me
179.description: Complete all Commendations for the 'Sea of Thieves: A Pirate's Life' Tall Tales.

215.name: A Professional Pirate
215.description: Unlock a Legendary Title by progressing your Pirate Milestones.

81.name: A Rare Delicacy
81.description: If reeling a coloured fish in, take care,  The Hunter's Call claim they're incredibly rare!

216.name: A Seasoned Ship
216.description: Unlock a Legendary Ship Title by progressing your Ship Milestones.

106.name: A Spectrum of Shadows
106.description: Defeat each colour of Shadow of Fate.

219.name: A Sunken Century
219.description: Sink 100 Faction ships in the Battle for the Sea of Thieves.

96.name: A Sunken Legacy
96.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Shroudbreaker' Tall Tale.

2.name: A Titanic Ensemble
2.description: A pirate may choose to go down with their ship. A musical send-off concludes their sad trip!

212.name: A Touch of Class
212.description: Hand in 200 treasure items to the Sovereigns.

211.name: A Veteran Voyager
211.description: Complete 30 Voyages aboard a Captained Ship.

253.name: A Wild Excursion
253.description: Pay a visit to the imposing Dagger Tooth Outpost.

100.name: Always Yours
100.description: Receive all Commendations for the 'Wild Rose' Tall Tale.

178.name: An Eternal Pirate Life
178.description: Complete all Commendations for 'Lords of the Sea'.

79.name: Another Pirate's Treasure
79.description: Ill-gotten gains - yet, after all,  they still sold to the Hunter's Call.

153.name: Athena's Greatest
153.description: Represent Athena's Fortune in the Legend Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

20.name: Aye of Reach
20.description: Visit the Weaponsmith, you'll find they teach the value of buying a new Eye of Reach!

155.name: Banisher of the Spectral Flame
155.description: Defeat the ghost of the Burning Blade 10 times!

109.name: Banishing the Damned
109.description: Clear the Fort of the Damned of all enemies, 10 times.

252.name: Be In-Spired
252.description: Pay a visit to the unforgettable Ancient Spire Outpost.

29.name: Become Pirate Legend
29.description: A true Pirate Legend is one of the greats and for them, Athena's Fortune awaits…

198.name: Beholder of Buried Treasures
198.description: You completed all Buried Treasures Commendations.

53.name: Black Powder Merchant
53.description: Receive the Commendation for delivering 100 Gunpowder Kegs on time.

221.name: Blessing of Athena's Fortune
221.description: Receive the Blessing of Athena's Fortune.

21.name: Blundarrrrbuss
21.description: The Weaponsmith's open, you'll see it's no fuss to purchase a glorious new blunderbuss!

1.name: Bone-Cronch
1.description: A skeleton cronches through thick yellow peel. Attack it and kill it before it can heal!

25.name: But You Have Heard Of Me?
25.description: Your reputation is starting to thrive. Grab your Promotion, you've reached twenty-five!

174.name: Captain of Haunted Waters
174.description: Complete all Commendations for 'Captains of the Damned'.

210.name: Chasing the Horizon
210.description: Spend 10 days at sea aboard a Captained ship, either as the Captain or one of the crew.

139.name: Collector of Legendary Treasures
139.description: Find and sell at least one of each Legendary Treasure.

22.name: Colourful Sails
22.description: Make your first buy from the Shipwright, who deals in figureheads, cannons, new sails and wheels!

168.name: Convenient Stores
168.description: Supplies from the Merchants will save you a wait. Buy every Resource and Commodity Crate!

294.name: Crew of Bone and Blade
294.description: Earn the Commendation 'Crew of Bone and Blade'.

268.name: Crew of the Burning Blade
268.description: Pledge your crew to the Burning Blade.

194.name: Critical Roll
194.description: You rolled a natural 20 using the Roll a D20 Emote.

3.name: Dead Pirates DO Tell Tales
3.description: All on the Ferry are sister and brother. Send forth a message to someone or other!

108.name: Defeating the Damned
108.description: Clear the Fort of the Damned of all enemies.

275.name: Defender of the Pirate's Life
275.description: Complete the 'Defender of the Pirate's Life' Commendation.

147.name: Deliverance
147.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Merchant Alliance.

28.name: Did Everyone See That?
28.description: A heavy attack while you've boarded their ship may send your foe over the side for a dip!

75.name: Dining With the Stars
75.description: A midnight snack, if you desire, cooked to perfection on a fire!

238.name: Distinguished Guild Member
238.description: Set sail representing a Guild you are a member of with Distinction 1 or higher.

233.name: Do the Monkey!
233.description: You completed all Commendations for 'The Lair of LeChuck'.

287.name: Eel-ectric Tide
287.description: Kill an Eel-ectric Ocean Crawler with a Trident of Dark Tides during a Barnacled Dread attack.

237.name: Emissary of Guilds
237.description: Become a Guild Emissary for the first time for a Guild to which you belong.

152.name: Employee of the Month
152.description: Represent the Merchant Alliance in the Admiral Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

301.name: Explorer of Sacred Places
301.description: Unlock all three Sanctuaries of the Banished.

97.name: Fateful Memories
97.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Cursed Rogue' Tall Tale.

154.name: Feeding the Flame
154.description: Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

111.name: Fire and Ash
111.description: Complete all commendations for The Seabound Soul

78.name: Five a Day
78.description: Sampling every type of fruit  will keep you fit to fight and loot!

143.name: For Athena
143.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for Athena's Fortune.

33.name: Friends Not Foe
33.description: A greeting, when given with Pirate Salute, can make a new friend - or perhaps a recruit!

13.name: Full Billow
13.description: All sails with the wind, what time it saves when speeding across the ocean's waves!

165.name: Get Wrecked
165.description: On Lost Shipment Voyages, locate a missing ship along each of the Merchants' trade routes.

55.name: Gilded Merchant
55.description: Receive the Commendation for earning 150,000 gold from Merchant Alliance Voyages.

150.name: Gold Hoarder Incarnate
150.description: Represent the Gold Hoarders in the Captain Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

162.name: Golden Retriever
162.description: Open three Treasure Vaults with gold vault keys.

140.name: Golden Ticket
140.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Gold Hoarders.

45.name: Golden Voyager
45.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 250 Gold Hoarder Voyages.

248.name: Guardian of Siren Song
248.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Savior of the Siren Song Grade 5'

235.name: Guild Initiate
235.description: Set sail on a ship enrolled in a Guild to which you belong.

14.name: Handbrake Turn
14.description: To swiftly avoid a great danger you're dreading, steer hard and drop anchor to alter your heading!

282.name: Hidden in Plain Sight
282.description: Complete the 'Hidden in Plain Sight' Commendation.

47.name: Hoarder of Barnacled Gold
47.description: Receive the Commendation for selling 300 Shipwrecked Chests.

49.name: Hoarder of the Captain’s Gold
49.description: Receive the Commendation for selling 360 Captain’s Chests.

4.name: Hold My Grog!
4.description: Launched from your vessel, this cannon-fired trip must see you land safe on the deck of a ship!

84.name: Hook, Line and Sinker
84.description: A platter of each kind of fish will serve the Hunters quite a dish!

224.name: Hot-Headed
224.description: Use a Skull of Destiny to begin 3 Fort of the Damned events.

24.name: How Appropriate! You Fight Like A Chicken
24.description: Your trusty blade was just too slow. Now it's your turn to feel their blow!

283.name: Hung Out to Dry
283.description: Complete the 'Hung Out to Dry' Commendation.

59.name: Hunter of Cursed Captains
59.description: Receive the Commendation for defeating 1,000 Skeleton Captains.

285.name: Hunter of the Noble Voyage
285.description: Dive to and complete a Hunter's Call Voyage.

83.name: Hunter of Trophy Fish
83.description: Receive the Commendation for delivering 25 Trophy Fish to The Hunter's Call.

42.name: I Am Not Obsessed With Treasure
42.description: A Voyage is over, back to land a merchant's cargo in your hand!

5.name: I Don’t See Your Ship
5.description: You fought a crew, stood strong and brave and sent their ship to a watery grave!

15.name: I Wanna Be A Pirate!
15.description: A Company's pleased and you've reason to revel if your Reputation increased by one level!

30.name: Ignoring The Rules Of Engagement
30.description: To strike from behind is a sneaky attack that leads to a blunderbuss shot in the back!

17.name: I'll Drink To That
17.description: Two different crews, their tankards held high, will meet at a tavern and drain them all dry!

8.name: I'm On A Whole New Adventure
8.description: So many voyages, but which one to do? Stow yours and vote for one placed by your crew.

27.name: In Good Company
27.description: A Company's items are sold to the loyal, five upgrades rewards you with their finest spoil!

38.name: It's A Pirates Life For Me
38.description: The Voyage is done; a chest of old now safe with those who hoard their gold!

256.name: Just Getting Started
256.description: Complete the Tutorial Voyage for the Gold Hoarders, Merchant Alliance and Order of Souls.

48.name: Keeper of a Glittering Hoard
48.description: Receive the Commendation for earning 150,000 gold from Gold Hoarder voyages.

263.name: Krack Shot
263.description: Hit a Kraken tentacle with scattershot.

31.name: Kraken Good Job
31.description: From under the waves a great creature arrived but you drove it away. Better still, you survived!

7.name: Laden With Treasure
7.description: You've overcome a score of tests and now you're hoarding twenty chests!

148.name: Legen… Wait for it… Dary!
148.description: Be promoted to level 20 with Athena's Fortune.

234.name: Legend of Monkey Island
234.description: You completed all Commendations for 'The Legend of Monkey Island' Tall Tales

85.name: Legendary Hunter of the Sea of Thieves
85.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 57 Grade 5 Hunter's Call Commendations.

260.name: Legendary Plunge
260.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for Athena's Fortune.

231.name: Legendary Trial Master
231.description: Complete all Commendations for 'The Quest for Guybrush'.

34.name: Legends - "Cronch"
34.description: Just like Griffin, your pirate kin, 'cronch' a banana and eat its skin!

35.name: Legends - "The Greatest Race of All Time!"
35.description: Side by side, two ships must race with weapons silenced for first place!

37.name: Legends - "The Skullduggers"
37.description: Five legends from across the sea playing instruments in harmony!

36.name: Legends - "This is Unacceptable!"
36.description: A chest of yours has gone astray and been cashed in as some thief's pay!

245.name: Liberator of Siren Song
245.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Sentry of the Siren Song Grade 5'

276.name: Loyalist of the Flame
276.description: Complete the 'Loyalist of the Flame' Commendation.

166.name: Many, Many Manifests
166.description: Recover 5 Revered Manifests while on Lost Shipment Voyages.

297.name: Marked Smuggler
297.description: Complete a Smugglers' Route Run Voyage.

200.name: Master Burglar
200.description: Discover 100 secret stashed treasures on a Sea Fort

196.name: Master Cartographer
196.description: You donated Treasure Stash maps to a Quest Board.

39.name: Master Gold Hoarder
39.description: You've gathered gold from near and far. A Master Hoarder now, you are!

61.name: Master Hunter Of Villainous Skulls
61.description: Receive the Commendation for selling 360 Villainous Skulls.

43.name: Master Merchant
43.description: The Merchant Alliance applauds your devotion bestowing upon you a Master Promotion!

244.name: Master of Siren Song
244.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Seeker of The Siren Song Grade 5'

86.name: Master of the Hunters
86.description: Purchase the Master Hunter Promotion from The Hunter's Call Trading Company.

41.name: Master of the Order
41.description: Sun-bleached skulls from across the ocean earn the Order's highest Promotion!

82.name: Meat and Greet
82.description: A feast of meats all roasted well, each kind to The Hunter's Call you'll sell.

229.name: Mêlée Island Investigator
229.description: Complete all Commendations for 'The Journey to Mêlée Island'.

60.name: Mercenary of the Ancient Order
60.description: Receive the Commendation for earning 150,000 gold from Order of Souls Voyages.

50.name: Merchant Adventurer
50.description: Correctly fill 250 animal crates whilst on Merchant Alliance Contract Voyages.

54.name: Merchant Forager
54.description: Receive the Commendation for delivering 50 Fruit Crates on time.

51.name: Merchant Voyager
51.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 250 Merchant Alliance Voyages.

170.name: Mist and Memory
170.description: Complete all Commendations for 'A Pirate's Life'.

184.name: Mystery of Ancient Tears
184.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Ancient Tears Commendation.

181.name: Mystery of Flooded Embrace
181.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Flooded Embrace Commendation.

180.name: Mystery of Hungering
180.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Hungering Commendation.

182.name: Mystery of Ocean's Fortune
182.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Ocean's Fortune Commendation.

183.name: Mystery of the Coral Tomb
183.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of the Coral Tomb Commendation.

185.name: Mystery of Tribute
185.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Tribute Commendation.

220.name: Nigh Unsinkable!
220.description: Earn an Allegiance Streak of 4 for either Faction.

80.name: Night Bite
80.description: Little fishie, all aglow,  off to The Hunter's Call you go.

191.name: Night-Time Spectacular
191.description: You set off a display of five or more fireworks at night.

163.name: No Mound Left Behind
163.description: Pick up all the mounds of gold inside a Treasure Vault.

77.name: Not So Well Done
77.description: Well-cooked meals are never easy,  dine too soon and you'll get queasy!

247.name: Novice of Siren Song
247.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Savior of the Siren Song Grade 1'

12.name: Now Bring Me That Horizon
12.description: Each new pirate greets the world with anchor raised and sails unfurled!

205.name: O Captain!
205.description: Set sail on a Captained ship as one of the crew.

254.name: Pay Your Respects
254.description: Pay a visit to the mysterious Galleon’s Grave Outpost.

172.name: Pearl in the Dark
172.description: Complete all Commendations for 'The Sunken Pearl'.

32.name: Perfect Dark
32.description: Through stormy seas in silent flight, no lanterns lit to pierce the night.

255.name: Pirate of Distinction
255.description: Earn a Distinction for any Trading Company.

250.name: Port of Call
250.description: Pay a visit to the sprawling Port Merrick.

209.name: Ready for Next Time
209.description: Save a fully-decorated, Captained ship in the Ship Decoration Chest.

94.name: Revenge of the Morningstar
94.description: Great evil sleeps below the sands, revenge at last within your hands!

261.name: Rib Roast
261.description: Defeat an Ashen Lord with the Double Barrel Pistol.

222.name: Ritual of the Flame
222.description: Undergo the Ritual of the Flame.

246.name: Sacrifice of Siren Song
246.description: Sink a ship carrying a Siren Song Treasure

46.name: Sailor of the Gold Horizon
46.description: Receive the Commendation for sailing 1,000 nautical miles on Gold Hoarder voyages.

52.name: Sailor of the Merchant Alliance
52.description: Receive the Commendation for sailing 1,000 nautical miles on Merchant Alliance Voyages.

58.name: Sailor of the Whispering Bones
58.description: Receive the Commendation for sailing 1,000 nautical miles on Order of Souls Voyages.

288.name: Sea Beast Spear Hunter
288.description: Hit Krakens, Megalodons or Ancient Megalodons using hunting spears.

98.name: Sea of Dreams
98.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Legendary Storyteller' Tall Tale.

104.name: Seeker of Grand Adventure
104.description: Receive all Commendations for all the Shores of Gold Tall Tales.

44.name: Seeker of Lost Maps
44.description: Dig Up 250 chests whilst on Gold Hoarder X Marks the Spot Voyages.

56.name: Seeker of Lost Souls
56.description: Defeat 500 skeletons on an Order of Souls Bounty Voyage.

197.name: Seeker of Pirate Plunder
197.description: You uncovered valuable treasures buried by other pirate crews.

187.name: Seeker of the Sea
187.description: Complete the Seeker of the Sea Commendation.

249.name: Seeking Sanctuary
249.description: Pay a visit to the beautiful Sanctuary Outpost.

26.name: Self Entitled
26.description: Titles are gathered from deeds near and far. Earn ten to show what type of pirate you are!

296.name: Shady Smuggler
296.description: Dive to and complete a Smugglers' League Voyage.

141.name: Ship of Souls
141.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Order of Souls.

16.name: Shopping for a Promotion
16.description: Your Voyages have earned you enough recognition so buy a Promotion and prove your position!

193.name: Sleepover
193.description: Sleep in a bed aboard another crew's ship.

105.name: Smile, you son of a…
105.description: That shark bit off more than it could chew, when it chose to mess with you.

265.name: Smooth Landing
265.description: Use the Horn of Fair Winds to avoid fall damage from a great height.

299.name: Smuggler at Sea
299.description: Find a lost Smuggler Ship Chronicle.

298.name: Smugglers' Riches
298.description: Earn 50,000 gold from The Smugglers' League.

145.name: So… Many… Chests!
145.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Gold Hoarders.

90.name: Stars of a Thief
90.description: The heavens' secrets, now concealed through ancient fable are revealed!

189.name: Stolen Secrets
189.description: You stole a Map Bundle from another crew.

107.name: Summoning the Damned
107.description: Activate the Fort of the Damned by lighting all six Flames of Fate and sacrificing a Ritual Skull.

186.name: Sunken Kingdom Marauder
186.description: Complete the Marauder of the Sunken Kingdom Commendation.

236.name: Sworn Guild Captain
236.description: Pledge a Captained Ship to a Guild.

11.name: Tactical Chunder
11.description: When threatened at sword point, remember this trick: blind your poor foe with a bucket of sick!

146.name: Taking Heads
146.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Order of Souls.

40.name: Taking Orders
40.description: Your Voyage complete, a skull returned, praise from the Order thusly earned!

213.name: That's 'Captain', Mate...
213.description: Set sail as a Captain of Adventure for the first time.

208.name: The Art Collector
208.description: Place 15 trinkets aboard a Captained ship at once.

92.name: The Art of the Trickster
92.description: A shining treasure you must claim, the prize within a deadly game!

138.name: The Blackwyche Reborn
138.description: Complete all commendations for Heart of Fire

88.name: The Cursed Rogue
88.description: A Cursed Rogue searching, never sleeping. What great secrets is she keeping?

93.name: The Fate of the Morningstar
93.description: Guide three wayward souls to rest, the next step on your golden quest!

228.name: The Journey to Mêlée Island
228.description: Complete 'The Journey to Mêlée Island' Commendation.

232.name: The Lair of LeChuck
232.description: You completed The Lair of LeChuck.

167.name: The Legend of Glitterbeard
167.description: Discover the final message left behind by Glitterbeard.

89.name: The Legendary Storyteller
89.description: Adventures told with a fearless grin. Perhaps some truths might lie within?

103.name: The Morningstar Rises
103.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Revenge of the Morningstar' Tall Tale.

151.name: The Order's Finest
151.description: Represent the Order of Souls in the Grandee Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

280.name: The Power of Three
280.description: Complete the 'The Power of Three' Commendation.

206.name: The Quartermaster
206.description: Stock your ship with each type of supply using the Ship's Manifest.

144.name: The Reaping Begins
144.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Reaper's Bones.

95.name: The Shores of Gold
95.description: Forbidden secrets must be told. What lies beneath the Shores of Gold?

87.name: The Shroudbreaker
87.description: A sunken ship and ancient key will set you on a great journey!

99.name: The Stolen Sky
99.description: Receive all Commendations for the 'Stars of a Thief' Tall Tale.

101.name: The Trickster's Folly
101.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Art of the Trickster' Tall Tale.

102.name: The Unbroken Bond
102.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Fate of the Morningstar' Tall Tale.

251.name: The Wonder of Plunder
251.description: Pay a visit to the towering Plunder Outpost.

267.name: This One's To Go
267.description: Use a zipline while carrying a treasure chest on your back.

262.name: Title Fight
262.description: Defeat a Skeleton Lord with a ranged throwing knife attack.

112.name: Tome of Curses I
112.description: Sell the Tome of Curses I.

113.name: Tome of Curses II
113.description: Sell the Tome of Curses II.

114.name: Tome of Curses III
114.description: Sell the Tome of Curses III.

115.name: Tome of Curses IV
115.description: Sell the Tome of Curses IV.

116.name: Tome of Curses V
116.description: Sell the Tome of Curses V.

125.name: Tome of Fire I
125.description: Sell the Tome of Fire I.

126.name: Tome of Fire II
126.description: Sell the Tome of Fire II.

127.name: Tome of Fire III
127.description: Sell the Tome of Fire III.

128.name: Tome of Fire IV
128.description: Sell the Tome of Fire IV.

129.name: Tome of Fire V
129.description: Sell the Tome of Fire V.

118.name: Tome of Power I
118.description: Sell the Tome of Power I.

119.name: Tome of Power II
119.description: Sell the Tome of Power II.

120.name: Tome of Power III
120.description: Sell the Tome of Power III.

121.name: Tome of Power IV
121.description: Sell the Tome of Power IV

122.name: Tome of Power V
122.description: Sell the Tome of Power V.

131.name: Tome of Resurrection I
131.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection I.

132.name: Tome of Resurrection II
132.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection II.

133.name: Tome of Resurrection III
133.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection III.

134.name: Tome of Resurrection IV
134.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection IV

135.name: Tome of Resurrection V
135.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection V.

142.name: Trade Ambassador
142.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Merchant Alliance.

192.name: Tribute Seat
192.description: You took a seat upon the throne during the 'Shores of Gold' Tall Tale.

204.name: True Legend
204.description: Complete 25 Legend of the Veil Voyages as a Grade 5 Athena Emissary

202.name: Veil Seeker
202.description: Complete 100 Legend of the Veil Quests

303.name: Violet Violence
303.description: Use a Black Powder Barrel on an Eternal Guard.

259.name: Voyager for the Alliance
259.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for the Merchant Alliance.

291.name: Voyager of Bones
291.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for The Reaper's Bones.

257.name: Voyager of Gold
257.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for the Gold Hoarders.

57.name: Voyager of Lost Souls
57.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 250 Order of Souls Voyages.

258.name: Voyager of the Soul
258.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for the Order of Souls.

266.name: Walk the Line
266.description: Travel 5 km walking along harpoon tightropes.

161.name: We Don't Need Maps
161.description: Find a Vault Key using only 1 piece of Torn Map Parchment.

76.name: Well Done!
76.description: Your hearty meal's turned out wrong.  You left it on the stove too long!

18.name: What Shall We Do with a Drunken Sailor?
18.description: Too many tankards of sweet, golden grog will first make you queasy, then sick as a dog…

10.name: When You're A Professional Pirate
10.description: Commendations are given by Companies when you've reached certain targets. Try to earn ten!

190.name: Who Needs A Bigger Boat?
190.description: You attacked a Megalodon or Kraken using a Cannon Rowboat.

91.name: Wild Rose
91.description: Jealous wrongs must be set right so two young lovers can unite!

164.name: Wreckless Pursuit
164.description: Locate the missing ship on a Lost Shipment Voyage without finding all the clues.

9.name: You Can Always Trust The Untrustworthy
9.description: Plundered from an unwary crew, their Captain's Chest cashed in - by you!

23.name: You Fight Like A Merchant
23.description: Dexterous swordplay can keep you alive. Block an attack and then strike within five!

218.name: You Gotta Fight
218.description: Win your first fight in the Battle for the Sea of Thieves.

149.name: You Reap What You See
149.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Reaper's Bones.

286.name: You're Going to Need a Bigger Bucket!
286.description: Attempt to extinguish the Ancient Feared Redmaw with a water bucket.
